member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_AUTOSCROLL_CONFIGURATION
member.summary: Determines the type and direction of automatic scrolling animation to apply.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_AUTOSCROLL_CONFIGURATION.DIRECTMANIPULATION_AUTOSCROLL_CONFIGURATION_STOP
member.summary: If content is scrolling, slowly stop along the direction of the motion.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_AUTOSCROLL_CONFIGURATION.DIRECTMANIPULATION_AUTOSCROLL_CONFIGURATION_FORWARD
member.summary: Scroll towards the positive boundary of the content.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_AUTOSCROLL_CONFIGURATION.DIRECTMANIPULATION_AUTOSCROLL_CONFIGURATION_REVERSE
member.summary: Scroll towards the origin of the content.
